name: Gummy Goo Clean Up
description:
Gummy Goo Clean Up is a platformer game where you play as Jerry The Janitor and go to a new location to clean it up. But as you get further into the place Jerry notices that this place is much different than other jobs he has had. Being a Janitor for over 40 years he has seen a lot, but what is this orange Goo? Clean all the trash, goo, and other stuff to progress through each area and uncover the mystery. You will use all different pieces of equipment such as a broom to clean the items and fight enemies as you progress.

Features on Full Release

- Single player Platform adventure with 10 levels that each add a new element to the challenge of beating the game!
- Full controller support!
- Level select to return to any level you already beat.
- 2 endings. The regular ending for completing the game and a special playable ending for cleaning everything in all levels.

Live Development
You can watch Gummytainment on Twitch develop the game live and give your feedback to improve it for all and have some fun!
